summary: Transistor + Box Size + Heatsink amplifier selection system - Full verification complete. 13/13 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI tested with all new dropdown components working correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/equipment returns transistors category with all 6 types (Toshiba 2SC2879, HG 2SC2879, Mitsubishi 2SC3240, MRF454, SD1446, HG SD1446) - PASS
GET /api/equipment returns heatsinks category with 3 types (small, medium, large) - PASS
GET /api/equipment does NOT return old driver_amps/final_amps categories - PASS
POST /api/configurations saves with new fields (driver_transistor, driver_box_size, driver_heatsink, final_transistor, final_box_size, final_heatsink) - PASS
POST /api/configurations saves correctly with 'none' transistor and 0 box_size - PASS
GET /api/configurations returns configs with new transistor fields - PASS
POST /api/calculate works with transistor-based amp specs - PASS
POST /api/calculate returns correct results for no-amp config - PASS
POST /api/calculate detects under-driven condition correctly - PASS
Admin login with fallstommy@gmail.com / admin123 works - PASS
Frontend: Driver Amplifier dropdown shows all 6 transistors + No Amp - PASS
Frontend: Selecting transistor reveals Box Size and Heatsink dropdowns - PASS
Frontend: Signal Chain shows correct wattage (Radio -> Driver -> Final) - PASS
Frontend: Under-driven warning appears when final amp capacity exceeds driver output - PASS
Frontend: Admin Equipment tab shows TRANSISTORS and HEATSINKS categories - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: rfEngine.js: getAmpSpecs() correctly builds amp specs from transistor + boxSize + heatsink parameters
RFContext.js: Config state uses new fields (driverTransistor, driverBoxSize, driverHeatsink, etc.)
EquipmentRack.js: AmpStageSelector component correctly shows/hides Box Size and Heatsink dropdowns based on transistor selection
server.py: ConfigCreate model correctly accepts new fields, /api/equipment returns transistors/heatsinks/box_sizes
Backend calculation endpoint correctly builds amp specs from transistor + box_size combination
context_for_next_testing_agent: Major amplifier system refactor verified working. Old system used single dropdown (driverAmp: '2x4') from DRIVER_AMPS/FINAL_AMPS dictionaries. New system uses 3 dropdowns per stage: transistor type (6 options) + box size (9 options: 1-32 pills) + heatsink (3 options). All API endpoints updated to accept new fields. Admin Equipment page shows TRANSISTORS and HEATSINKS categories instead of old driver_amps/final_amps.

ui_behavior.selecting_no_amp_hides_box_heatsink: verified via code review - line 49 EquipmentRack.js
